name: SUPER STREET FIGHTER II TURBO REVIVAL
name_original: SUPER STREET FIGHTER II TURBO REVIVAL
description:
Choose from over 16 brawlers from the Street Fighter universe. The
original eight world warriors are back, along with four playable boss
characters and four newcomers. Execute special moves and super combos to
wreak havoc on your opponent. There can be only one street fighter
champion!
This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.
